data.actual_result: On very few occasions it sends the image, but expect "Unable to load file".
data.short_description: When trying to send images (for example a wallpaper I found) it tells me "Unable to load file". Then I either send it so many times till it actually sends or it doesn't work at all.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a picture in discord and use the direct download button - Send the picture to a channel or a user - If it's not working try again s many times as possible
